name: automation-drivermanagement-synapsis
description: Automation tests for Driver Management Synapsis

scripts.test:chrome: npx playwright test --project="Driver Monitoring System In Chrome"
scripts.test:firefox: npx playwright test --project="Driver Monitoring System In Firefox"
scripts.test:safari: npx playwright test --project="Driver Monitoring System In Safari"
scripts.test:login:allure: npm run allure:history && npx playwright test login.test.ts --reporter=allure-playwright,line
scripts.test:allure: npm run allure:history && npx playwright test --reporter=allure-playwright,line
scripts.report:allure: npm run allure:setup && allure generate ./allure-results --clean && allure open ./allure-report
scripts.report:allure:trends: npm run allure:setup && allure generate ./allure-results --clean && npx ts-node ./utils/copyTrends.ts && allure open ./allure-report
scripts.report:allure:full: npm run allure:setup && allure generate ./allure-results --clean && allure open ./allure-report -p 9999
